channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Bombs With Swing Voters In Debate
item.description: President Joe Biden got off to a slow start in the debate, but swing voters were turned off by Donald Trump.

item.title: White House Leaves Out Key Fact in Statements on Alleged Murders of Americans by Illegal Aliens
item.description: Over the past two weeks, Americans have seen numerous stories about horrific crimes allegedly committed by illegal aliens. The White House commented on two cases but failed to mention a key fact. To read the rest of the article click here The post White House Leaves Out Key Fact in Statements on Alleged Murders of Americans by Illegal Aliens appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: CNN Moderators Do Zero Factchecking And It Leads To Awful Presidential Debate
item.description: CNN decided that they would do no fact checking at the presidential debate and it led to an unwatchable 90 minutes that left voters mis and underinformed.

item.title: How to Drive Down the Cost of Medical Care for Illegals? Just Ask
item.description: The ballooning costs of medical care for illegal aliens is a huge burden on states and cities across the U.S. FAIR’s 2023 cost study found that at least $21 billion in taxpayer funds are spent by states and local governments on healthcare for illegal aliens every year, and that number is only increasing as the [...] The post How to Drive Down the Cost of Medical Care for Illegals? Just Ask appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Melania Trump Is Not At The Debate, But Jill Biden Is
item.description: Jill Biden is there to support her husband at the debate, but Melania Trump is nowhere to be seen.

item.title: The Great Paradox: How Unchecked Mass Migration Hurts Migrants
item.description: Pro-mass-migration voices depict mass migration as an unqualified good for everyone involved, minimizing or refusing to even acknowledge negative side effects or costs. To read the rest of the article click here The post The Great Paradox: How Unchecked Mass Migration Hurts Migrants appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Trump Can Barely Walk Down The Steps As He Arrives At Presidential Debate
item.description: A slow moving disheveled Trump showed up for the presidential debate barely able to get down the steps.

item.title: Senators Move to Overturn Biden Rule, Prevent Further Exploitation of Unaccompanied Children
item.description: Earlier this month, Senator Chuck Grassley (R-Iowa) introduced S.J. Res. 94, a Congressional Review Act (CRA) resolution to overturn the Biden administration’s Unaccompanied Children Program Foundational Rule. To read the rest of the article click here The post Senators Move to Overturn Biden Rule, Prevent Further Exploitation of Unaccompanied Children appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: CNN Won’t Allow Reporters In Debate Studio
item.description: The White House Correspondents Association has expressed concern that CNN will not allow a pool reporter inside the debate studio to cover and document the candidates' remarks.

item.title: Senators Move to Overturn Biden Rule, Prevent Further Exploitation of Unaccompanied Children
item.description: Earlier this month, Senator Chuck Grassley (R-Iowa) introduced S.J. Res. 94, a Congressional Review Act (CRA) resolution to overturn the Biden administration’s Unaccompanied Children Program Foundational Rule. To read the rest of the article click here The post Senators Move to Overturn Biden Rule, Prevent Further Exploitation of Unaccompanied Children appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .
